title: Is Shashi Bhushan Tiwari good for JEE advanced physics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Physics book by Shashi bhushan tiwari is good for conceptual problems but not very much recommended by most of the teachers . You should prefer NCERT to build your basic concept and make sure you do each and every example and exercise questions of Ncert before jumping to a reference book .After completing ncert thoroughly refer to your coaching material or any reference book as mentioned below -Concept of physics by HC VERMA2. Fundamental physics /arihant physics 3. IIT Jee physics 35 year chapter wise - DC Pandey. 4. irodov/krotov for touching jee advanced level especially for physics lover. 5. Pathfinder for beautiful problems and solid/strong concept. Thanks for asking.
